doc.field: Petro-Canada, a state-owned oil company, raised the posting prices of sweet and sour crude oils 32 cts Canadian per barrel, effective today, the company said. The change brings the price of light sweet crude to 26.50 dlrs Canadian per barrel and the price of light sour crude to 23.77 dlrs Canadian a barrel. The crude oils are from Edmonton/Swann Hills. Reuter
